entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then light snow and local blowing snow beginning overnight. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
